channel.title: Custom yell[pi]
channel.description:
hey guys how do i make a custom yell for my server? im trying to make it so if the player
expoze yells something, instead of owner, it says server coder. can you give me the snippet of the command? im using p.i hybrid pvp thanks

item.title: Custom yell[pi]
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

Post the whole error if you want me to help you. ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Custom yell[pi]
item.dc:creator: @expozee expozee
item.description:
@expozee wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:2, topic:395338”] }else if (c.playerRights == 4){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Coder]</col><img=2>"+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

On my server, I gave my co-coders 4 player rights and added that to my ::yell command. You’d just have to change where it says,

To:

I think.[/quote]
it says this jake
^

Read full topic

On my server, I gave my co-coders 4 player rights and added that to my ::yell command. You’d just have to change where it says,
